utils


misc macros


ame_check_filename_duplicates

macro(ame_check_filename_duplicates p_folder)
type: Cmake macro
description: check if folder contains two files with the same name

ame_add_utest

macro(ame_add_utest p_targetName)
type: Cmake macro
description: add a unit test as POST-BUILD command

ame_embed_file

macro(ame_embed_file p_targetName p_inputfile p_outputDir p_symbol p_mode)
type: Cmake macro
description: embed a file and add it to target

ame_add_companion_files

macro(ame_add_companion_files p_target)
type: Cmake macro
description: create commands to copy companion files in targat binary dir

ame_check_companion_elements

macro(ame_check_companion_elements p_target p_searchTarget)
type: Cmake macro
description: add companion elements from target dependencies
